name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Scotiabank to buy Citigroup assets in Panama and Costa Rica

content: TORONTO Bank of Nova Scotia has warned regional soccer body CONCACAF  which is deeply enmeshed in the FIFA bribery scandal  that it will withhold funds from a major sponsorship deal unless the confederation cleans up its act  according to a source familiar with the bank’s position.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Exclusive: Scotiabank warns soccer’s CONCACAF to clean up its act or funds will be withheld

content: TORONTO  June 17 The government of Ontario has selected investment banks Scotiabank and RBC Capital Markets as bookrunners for the initial public offering of electric utility Hydro One.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Ontario selects Scotiabank  RBC to lead Hydro One IPO

content: TORONTO  May 29 Bank of Nova Scotia  reported a quarterly profit that beat market expectations on Friday and outlined a plan to buy back shares as earnings grew at its Canadian banking division.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: UPDATE 2-Scotiabank quarterly profit tops estimates  to buy back shares

content: TORONTO  May 28 Bank of Nova Scotia  an official partner of the governing body of soccer in North and Central America and the Caribbean  said on Thursday it would review sponsorship ties following the indictment of several soccer officials on corruption charges.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Canada's Scotiabank reviews soccer sponsorship after FIFA arrests

content: TORONTO  May 29 Bank of Nova Scotia  reported a quarterly profit that came in ahead of market expectations on Friday  supported by gains in its global banking and markets division  and said it planned to buy back shares.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Scotiabank second-quarter profit tops estimates  to buy back shares

content: Canada's Bank of Nova Scotia  sued Cliffs Natural Resources Inc   saying the U.S. iron ore miner had breached terms of a loan agreement when it filed for creditor protection for its Canadian operations.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Scotiabank sues Cliffs Natural for breach of loan terms

content: * Cliffs shares fall as much as 7.2 pct   (Adds comment from Scotiabank  analyst  shares)
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: UPDATE 2-Scotiabank sues Cliffs Natural for breach of loan terms

content: March 19 Iron ore miner Cliffs Natural Resources Inc said it has been sued by Canada's Bank of Nova Scotia for about $52.6 million for breaching some debt terms related to its Bloom Lake mine in Quebec.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Cliffs Natural says Scotiabank suing for breach of debt terms

content: March 3 Bank of Nova Scotia posted a lower-than-expected quarterly profit on Tuesday  hurt by an increase in credit-loss provisions and higher expenses  and its shares fell 1.4 percent.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: UPDATE 3-Scotiabank profit misses expectations; shares slip

content: Bank of Nova Scotia   Canada's No. 3 lender  reported a lower-than-expected quarterly profit  hurt by higher provisions and a "softer" performance in its investment banking business.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Scotiabank profit constrained by 'softer' investment banking

content: March 3 Bank of Nova Scotia  Canada's No. 3 lender  reported a marginal rise in first-quarter profit on Tuesday  led by its global banking & markets unit.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Scotiabank's profit rises marginally  dividend raised

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  January 23 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Bank of Nova Scotia's  (The) (BNS) long- and short-term Issuer Default Ratings (IDRs) at 'AA-' and  'F1+' respectively.  This affirmation reflects BNS's good earnings performance   earnings diversity  strong funding and liquidity position  and above peer median  capital ratios.  At the same time  Fitch has kept the Rating Outlook for BNS at  Stable.   This rating action follows a pe
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Fitch Affirms Bank of Nova Scotia's (The) IDRS at 'AA-/F1+'; Outlook Remains Stable

content: Coupon                  3 month euribor + 38 basis points
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: New Issue- BNS prices 1 bln euro 2020 FRN

content: Lead Manager(s)         Scotiabank  Barclays  Deutsche Bank  J.P. Morgan
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: New Issue- Bank Of Nova Scotia adds 300 mln stg to 2017 FRN

content: TORONTO  Jan 8 Bank of Nova Scotia led investment banks in Canada in the value of equity issues it advised on in 2014  driven by a few high-profile initial public offerings and some big oil and gas deals before the oil-price rout in the year's second half.
name: Bank of Nova Scotia (The)
title: Scotiabank tops in Canada equity issues in 2014 as big deals dominate
